note: Distinguished Professor in Atmospheric Chemistry, UC San Diego. Director of NSF CAICE (http://caice.ucsd.edu)
Sociologist at UC San Diego. Author of Automating Finance (2019) & The Quantified Scholar (2022) http://tinyurl.com/2p82v69n Associate Director at LAS UCSD

fields.name: What do I do?
fields.value: I'm a sociologist working at UCSD. I study markets and teach methods, science and technology studies, and economic sociology.

fields.name: What am I working on?
fields.value: I'm working on two books. One is on the politics of scientific elites in Mexico. The other is on the role of budget models in racializing American higher education.

fields.name: What do I think matters?
fields.value: The world is burning. Let's try to make that stop, please.
